SEARCH
Package com.dhk.ui

Class DhkView

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.ui.DhkView
public class DhkView extends Object
This class defines the view for Display Hot Keys. The layout for the view components is defined here. View components are initialized and arranged in a GridBag layout.
Version:
1.3.2
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024

  • Method Details

    • initView

      public void initView(Point frameLocation)
      This method initializes the view of the application. It creates a new frame, sets the frame properties, initializes the panels, and initializes the view components.
      Parameters:
      frameLocation - - The point to spawn the view's frame at.

    • reInitView

      public void reInitView()
      This method re-initializes the view of the application.

    • pushSlots

      public void pushSlots(int displayIndex, int startIndex)
      This method adds slots to the main panel until the number of active slots for the given display is reached.
      Parameters:
      displayIndex - - The index of the display to add slots in the view for.
      startIndex - - The index in which to start adding slots to the view.

    • popSlots

      public void popSlots(int numOfSlotsToRemove)
      This method removes the specified number of slots from the end of the main panel.
      Parameters:
      numOfSlotsToRemove - - The number of slots to remove from the end of the main panel.

    • replaceActiveSlots

      public void replaceActiveSlots()
      This method replaces the active slots from the previously connected display with the active slots for the newly selected display.

    • showNumberOfActiveSlotsForDisplay

      public void showNumberOfActiveSlotsForDisplay(int displayIndex)
      This method removes the current number of active slots combo box and add the correct one for the selected display.
      Parameters:
      displayIndex - - The index of the display to show the number of active slots combo box for.
